quizDescription.text: The following is the schema we are going to use.
Person(name, age, gender) - Person contains name, age, gender
Frequents(name, pizzeria) - Frequents contains name of a person and pizzeria’s he visited
Eats(name, pizza) - Eats contains name of a person and types of pizza’s he ate.
Serves(pizzeria, pizza, price) - Serves contain pizzeria, and types of pizza’s that pizzeria serves and price of pizza.
Create a database named Pizza and dump the below given file in to your database.
